post_text: The December Board meeting is scheduled for Wednesday December 18, 2019. The board will have a work session prior to the start of the 7:00 pm meeting. Items on the agenda include: selecting the Belcher Scholarhip nominee, Setting the date for the CSIP meeting, and reviewing the current staffing and needs for 2020-2021. An Executive session will be help immediately following the regular meeting according to Missouri Revised Statute 610.021, (3) and (6)
